pci_projects_project_network_private_vra: You have not yet created a private network.
Connect your instances across private networks with the OVHcloud vRack, wherever they are located.

Private networks are created on-demand, and instantly. They guarantee level 2 isolation, and can host a DHCP service to automatically provide IP addressing to your instances. Each of these networks can be reduced to one location, or extended to all of your projectâ€™s locations.
Your private networks are contained in your vRack. They can then be connected to other OVHcloud solutions attached to the same vRack, using a common VLAN ID.
